.method public static hidebysig void BeginFailoverPriorityChange(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.IDatabaseAccountsOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string accountName, class Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Models.FailoverPolicies failoverParameters) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub BeginFailoverPriorityChange (operations As IDatabaseAccountsOperations, resourceGroupName As String, accountName As String, failoverParameters As FailoverPolicies)
static member BeginFailoverPriorityChange : Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.IDatabaseAccountsOperations * string * string * Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Models.FailoverPolicies -> unit

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
Cosmos DB database account name.
The new failover policies for the database account.
Docs.summary: Changes the failover priority for the Azure Cosmos DB database account. A failover priority of 0 indicates a write region. The maximum value for a failover priority = (total number of regions - 1). Failover priority values must be unique for each of the regions in which the database account exists.

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
Cosmos DB database account name.

An OData filter expression that describes a subset of metrics to return. The parameters that can be filtered are name.value (name of the metric, can have an or of multiple names), startTime, endTime, and timeGrain. The supported operator is eq.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given database account.
